data.name: Warplanes: Air Corp
data.description:
Move into the middle of the modern battlefield in Warplanes: Air Corp in VR. The third installment of the best-selling Warplanes series introduces a new era of modern military aviation. In addition to fighter jets and multirole combat aircraft you are able to pilot attack helicopters!

Flight simulators are too complicated for you? We got this covered – both the flight model and the control of machines have been simplified as much as possible so that you can enjoy dynamic and spectacular combat. 

Upgrade your machines – buy modern armaments, adjust them according to mission objectives, so as to inflict the greatest damage on the enemy.  Utilize advanced tactics – destroy high-tech air defense systems using helicopters, reduce the range of artillery by destroying mobile radars.

Fight in the air against a wide range of fighter jets, multirole aircraft, helicopters and armed drones. Destroy ships, tankers, convoys, and an array of modern military vehicles like armored personnel carriers, tanks, and mobile rocket launchers. Fight in urbanized areas, destroy or protect strategic buildings and infrastructure. Use all available units to raze enemy military bases.

● Acquire a total of 9 machines inspired by the best combat aircraft from around the world.
● Adjust the difficulty level of combat to your preference - you can turn off the automatic targeting system and release flares manually.
● Play co-op, and classic PvP multiplayer modes to face off against other players.

changelog.change_log:
Version 1.4 changelog:
- Take-offs and landings.
- Rearming option – land on helipad to replenish ammunition.
- Bug fixes and other improvements.

Version 1.3.0.7:
 - New helicopter – ND 530c.
 - VTOL mode in MF-35.
 - Helicopter flight model tweaks.
 - Graphics improvements – volumetric clouds
 - Campaign difficulty tweaks, mission goals clarity improvements.
 - Bug fixes and other improvements.

Version 1.2:
 - Flight Setup - a new section that will allow you to adjust the flight mode and sensitivity of the onboard instruments to your needs.
 - New helicopter Hi-24 Hind.
 - Aircraft controls and flight modes improvements.
 - Graphics and sound improvements.

Version 1.1.0.1:
 - Two new flight modes: Arcade and Simulation. 
 - Combat experience improvements (enemy AI, aiming)
 - Graphics and optimization tweaks.

Version 1.0.1.1:
- Fixed aircraft rudder behavior.
- Improved AI of enemy helicopters.
- Minor graphics fixes.
- New music track in Free Flight mode.
- Bug fixes.

Version 1.0.0.1:
- A physics-based helicopter and plane flight model written from scratch.
- Free Flight mode - choose a map and fly alone or fight with aircraft of your choice.
- Terrain and foliage graphics improvements.
- Improvements to the design and lighting of buildings in cities.
- Graphic improvements in cockpits - new shaders, improved textures, new yoke, new on-board instruments.
- New flight model for AI flying vehicles.
- 4 control layouts to choose from the Controls section.
- New biomes - autumn and winter.
- New music tracks.
- Sound improvements and new SFX effects.
- Bug fixes.

– Multiplayer mode beta is now available.
– Fixed various graphical glitches.
– Increased foliage density.
– Fixed various mission related issues.
– Many bug fixes and tweaks.
